verses.roman:
tāṅra nābhi-padma haite uṭhila eka padma
sei padme haila brahmāra janma-sadma

synonyms: tāṅra—His; nābhi-padma—lotus navel; haite—from; uṭhila—grew; eka—one; padma—lotus flower; sei padme—on that lotus; haila—there was; brahmāra—of Lord Brahmā; janma-sadma—the place of birth.
translation: From His navel grew a lotus flower, which became the birthplace of Lord Brahmā.
